meta.title: LAB SEVEN - Labrador Field Systems
meta.description: Silent battery power for city services, live events, and public venues. Zero emissions, zero noise.

hero.title: LAB SEVEN BATTERY
hero.description: Silent battery power for city services, live events, and public venues. True 60A output. Zero emissions, zero noise complaints, zero permits.

items.title: True 60A Power
items.description: The only battery with 60A Bates out. Three 20A Edison circuits and 1 60A Bates. No adapters needed.

items.title: Fastest Charging
items.description: Charge one battery in 1 hour using 60A Bates input, or 4-5 hours using standard 110v outlet.

items.title: Professional Reliability
items.description: LFP chemistry, BMS protection, real-time monitoring. 7.5kWh storage. Built for production demands.

items.title: Saves Money Over Generators
items.description: When you add fuel runs, fire watch, noise complaints, and slow wrap, generators cost more than the day rate suggests.

items.title: Works Where Generators Can't
items.description: Indoor venues, noise-restricted zones, residential areas, and historic locations that prohibit generators.

items.title: Turn Any Outlet Into 60A Distro
items.description: Plug into standard 15/20A receptacle, cap the draw, let the pack cover peaks. Less friction, fewer noise complaints.

items.title: Use Existing Distro
items.description: Nobody needs to change workflows. Use the same distro boxes you always have. Professional-grade compatibility.
